title: Dealing With Difficult People | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Dealing With Difficult People | Joel Osteen
description:
How you deal with difficult people is a test of your character. If you’ll choose to take the high road, God will fight your battles for you.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
